1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Tree of tokens
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.TokenTree
7  ( -- * Type
8    TTree, NamedTree, NamedTrees,
9
10    -- * Pattern
11    pattern TermLeafName,
12    pattern TextLeaf,
13    pattern TextLeafRaw,
14    pattern TextLeafQ,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token            as S
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Bracket    as S
20
21
22-- --------------------------------------------  Token tree
23
24-- | Tree of tokens.
25type TTree = B.CodeTree S.BracketType S.Token
26
27-- | Pair of token trees and its name.
28type NamedTrees = B.Named [TTree]
29
30-- | Pair of token tree and its name.
31type NamedTree = B.Named TTree
32
33
34-- --------------------------------------------  Pattern
35
36-- | Term leaf.
37{-# DEPRECATED TermLeafName "Use LTerm instead." #-}
38pattern TermLeafName  cp w  = B.TreeL (S.TTerm  cp w)
39
40-- | Text leaf.
41{-# DEPRECATED TextLeaf "Use LText instead." #-}
42pattern TextLeaf form cp w  = B.TreeL (S.TText   cp form w)
43
44-- | Text leaf of 'S.TextRaw'.
45{-# DEPRECATED TextLeafRaw "Use LRaw instead." #-}
46pattern TextLeafRaw   cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextRaw cp w
47
48-- | Text leaf of 'S.TextQ'.
49{-# DEPRECATED TextLeafQ "Use LQ instead." #-}
50pattern TextLeafQ     cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextQ   cp w
